text: Neeraj Chaturvedi is an Indian politician and a former member of Uttar Pradesh Legislative Assembly three times. He is an active member of BJP. He represented Generalganj Constituency of Kanpur city in Uttar Pradesh legislative Assembly from 1991 to 2002.He is also member of Executive Committee of BJP Uttar Pradesh. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Uttar Pradesh Category:Politicians from Kanpur Category:Members of the Uttar Pradesh Legislative Assembly Category:1952 births
title: Neeraj Chaturvedi
